snippet: The son of an Afghan mujahedeen leader was among a group of Taliban prisoners released by Pakistan to help start peace negotiations with the militant group.
abstract: Anwarul Haq Mujahid, son of Afghan mujahedeen leader Mohammad Yunus Khalis, is among group of Taliban prisoners released by Pakistan to help start peace negotiations with the militant group.
lead_paragraph: The son of an Afghan mujahedeen leader was among a group of Taliban prisoners released by Pakistan to help start peace negotiations with the militant group.

headline.seo: Son of Afghan Mujahedeen Leader Is Released by Pakistan
